26.title: Mobile-Ready Quick Reference Index
26.description: A condensed, hyperlinked directory of all core field triggers, action items, policy summaries, and field FAQs for use on mobile or tablet in the field.
features: Searchable list of all major triggers (deferral, callback, SOW, QA, safety, etc.)
One-tap access to action items, required documentation, and compliance steps
Hyperlinked policy citations for each trigger or field question
Printable/mobile PDF and web app versions for offline use
‘Egg of the Day’ and field wisdom snippets for staff engagement
update_protocol: Quick Reference updated with each major logic or policy change
Field staff may request new triggers or FAQ entries as needed

27.title: Bonus Tools – Export Templates, Job Dashboard & Travel Packet

tools.name: Export Templates Library
tools.description: Downloadable forms: QCI checklist, callback log, deferral notice, scope justification, and client communication templates.

tools.name: Job Dashboard
tools.description: Visual tracker for all jobs by status (open, callback, deferral, complete), field staff assignments, and scope QA status.
features: One-click export for audit or manager review

tools.name: Travel Packet
tools.description: Printable ‘field packet’ for each job—client info, SOW summary, required checklists, maps, and emergency contacts for staff working offline.

update_and_feedback_protocol: Bonus tools reviewed and updated annually
Field staff and managers may submit suggestions for new templates or dashboard features
